android.title: authORIzed - Protect against counterfeit products
android.description:
autORIzed is an application that helps you to determine the authenticity of the products you buy (fashion, spare part, ticket, medicinal drugs, food products, luxurious, and others).
autORIzed offers two guarantees:

autORIzed through the unique code is a guarantee for consumers who have a simple and effective way to check for themselves the authenticity of the products they buy.

With complex algorithms and codes in a hologram that locks in the database into your guarantee with the maximum level of security.

autORIzed protect consumers from counterfeit products through the use of applications autORIzed. Maximum assurance, and global protection against counterfeiting and consequently increase the value of your product.

autORIzed Allow customers to verify online to Ensure review their products they have purchased your product, not a copy.

because it is fast and very easy to verify, provide your customers have access to a computer, smartphone or tablet they can verify their purchases reviewed in moments

highlights: dynamic theme (dark mode and light mode)
